mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lee updates a family friend on the Lee family's activities over the previous summer. He mentions travels and visits to healing springs, etc. Lee provides short commentary on the Franco-Prussian War (1870-1871). He also mentions that Mrs. Albert Sidney Johnston and friends are guests of his in Lexington.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Smith, Maggie
Harrison, Belle
Johnston, Eliza Griffin
Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870 -- Family
Franco-Prussian War, 1870-1871
Mineral waters -- Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter to Miss Maggie Smith, September 9, 1870 (correspondence)
